channel.title: Hi!
channel.description:
I did not see a section for this so please do not flame me (Mods please move this topic is there is). Well about me, I have played RSC since 1999 and just quit RS2 becasue I finally got fed up with Jagex. Came here to start work on a RSC Server. Not planing on it to be anything special more of a learning experience for my programming (I know no java what so ever, (C++ FTW :) ) ). So yeah hi hope I have good times on here. Was here a few years back but was sick of tired of all the useless flaming from stupid members.
Edit:Question: Are the two forums linked? The server development one and this one in terms of rep, posts and such?

item.title: Hi!
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Wow, that was almost funny!

Sheepy, if you’re looking into RSC private server development, then http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php#20 is what you’re looking for. The two forums are linked when it comes to profile information, with the sole exception of reputation points, which are earned separately on both sites.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi!
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Wow! Since 1999? That’s like two years before it came out! I’m so jealous!

Read full topic

item.title: Hi!
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

No, we are not linked.

On another topic

www.moparisthebest.com/smf

Read full topic

item.title: Hi!
item.dc:creator: @sheepy sheepy
item.description:
@sheepy wrote:

What really was the point of that? I know that is the other one but that does not solve my question. I registered for the other forum and I was automaticly registered for this one so that is what sprung the question.

Read full topic
